name: background-play
description: Enables playing music in the background.

name: client-spoof
description: Spoofs the YouTube client to prevent playback issues.

name: client-spoof-music
description: Spoofs the YouTube Music client.

name: custom-branding-icon-afn-blue
description: Changes the YouTube launcher icon (Afn / Blue).

name: custom-branding-icon-afn-red
description: Changes the YouTube launcher icon (Afn / Red).

name: custom-branding-icon-revancify
description: Changes the YouTube launcher icon (Revancify).

name: custom-branding-music-afn-blue
description: Changes the YouTube Music launcher icon (Afn / Blue).

name: custom-branding-music-afn-red
description: Changes the YouTube Music launcher icon (Afn / Red).

name: custom-branding-music-revancify
description: Changes the YouTube Music launcher icon to your choice (Revancify).

name: custom-branding-name
description: Changes the YouTube launcher name to your choice (defaults to ReVanced Extended).

name: custom-seekbar-color
description: Change seekbar color in dark mode.

name: custom-video-speed
description: Adds more video speed options.

name: default-video-quality
description: Adds ability to set default video quality settings.

name: default-video-speed
description: Adds ability to set default video speed settings.

name: disable-haptic-feedback
description: Disable haptic feedback when swiping.

name: disable-shorts-player-pip
description: Disable PiP mode in YouTube Shorts player.

name: enable-black-navbar
description: Sets the navigation bar color to black.

name: enable-color-match-player
description: Matches the fullscreen player color with the minimized one.

name: enable-external-browser
description: Use an external browser to open the url.

name: enable-force-minimized-player
description: Permanently keep player minimized even if another track is played.

name: enable-force-shuffle
description: Enable force shuffle even if another track is played.

name: enable-minimized-playback
description: Enables minimized and background playback.

name: enable-old-layout
description: Spoof the YouTube client version to use the old layout.

name: enable-old-quality-layout
description: Enables the original quality flyout menu.

name: enable-open-links-directly
description: Bypass URL redirects (youtube.com/redirect) when opening links in video descriptions.

name: enable-opus-codec
description: Enable opus codec when playing audio.

name: enable-seekbar-tapping
description: Enables tap-to-seek on the seekbar of the video player.

name: enable-tablet-miniplayer
description: Enables the tablet mini player layout.

name: enable-tablet-mode
description: Enable landscape mode on phone.

name: enable-wide-searchbar
description: Replaces the search icon with a wide search bar. This will hide the YouTube logo when active.

name: enable-zen-mode
description: Adds a grey tint to the video player to reduce eye strain.

name: exclusive-audio-playback
description: Enables the option to play music without video.

name: force-premium-heading
description: Forces premium heading on the home screen.

name: force-vp9-codec
description: Forces the VP9 codec for videos.

name: header-switch
description: Add switch to change header.

name: hide-auto-captions
description: Hide captions from being automatically enabled.

name: hide-auto-player-popup-panels
description: Hide automatic popup panels (playlist or live chat) on video player.

name: hide-autoplay-button
description: Hides the autoplay button in the video player.

name: hide-button-container
description: Adds the options to hide action buttons under a video.

name: hide-cast-button
description: Hides the cast button in the video player.

name: hide-channel-watermark
description: Hides creator's watermarks on videos.

name: hide-comment-component
description: Adds options to hide comment component under a video.

name: hide-compact-header
description: Hides the music category bar at the top of the homepage.

name: hide-create-button
description: Hides the create button in the navigation bar.

name: hide-crowdfunding-box
description: Hides the crowdfunding box between the player and video description.

name: hide-email-address
description: Hides the email address in the account switcher.

name: hide-endscreen-cards
description: Hides the suggested video cards at the end of a video in fullscreen.

name: hide-endscreen-overlay
description: Hide endscreen overlay on swipe controls.

name: hide-filmstrip-overlay
description: Hide flimstrip overlay on swipe controls.

name: hide-flyout-panel
description: Adds options to hide player settings flyout panel.

name: hide-fullscreen-panels
description: Hides video description and comments panel in fullscreen view.

name: hide-general-ads
description: Hooks the method which parses the bytes into a ComponentContext to filter components.

name: hide-get-premium
description: Removes all "Get Premium" evidences from the avatar menu.

name: hide-info-cards
description: Hides info-cards in videos.

name: hide-live-chat-button
description: Hides the live chat button in the video player.

name: hide-mix-playlists
description: Removes mix playlists from home feed and video player.

name: hide-music-ads
description: Removes ads in the music player.

name: hide-music-cast-button
description: Hides the cast button in the video player and header

name: hide-next-prev-button
description: Hides the next prev button in the player controller.

name: hide-pip-notification
description: Disable pip notification when you first launch pip mode.

name: hide-player-captions-button
description: Hides the captions button in the video player.

name: hide-player-overlay-filter
description: Remove the dark filter layer from the player's background.

name: hide-shorts-button
description: Hides the shorts button in the navigation bar.

name: hide-shorts-component
description: Hides other Shorts components.

name: hide-snackbar
description: Hides the snackbar action popup.

name: hide-startup-shorts-player
description: Disables playing YouTube Shorts when launching YouTube.

name: hide-stories
description: Hides YouTube Stories shelf on the feed.

name: hide-suggested-actions
description: Hide the suggested actions bar inside the player.

name: hide-taste-builder
description: Removes the "Tell us which artists you like" card from the home screen.

name: hide-time-and-seekbar
description: Hides progress bar and time counter on videos.

name: hide-tooltip-content
description: Hides the tooltip box that appears on first install.

name: hide-upgrade-button
description: Removes the upgrade tab from the pivot bar.

name: hide-video-ads
description: Removes ads in the video player.

name: layout-switch
description: Tricks the dpi to use some tablet/phone layouts.

name: materialyou
description: Enables MaterialYou theme for Android 12+

name: microg-support
description: Allows YouTube ReVanced to run without root and under a different package name with Vanced MicroG.

name: minimized-playback-music
description: Enables minimized playback on Kids music.

name: music-microg-support
description: Allows YouTube Music ReVanced to run without root and under a different package name.

name: music-settings
description: Adds settings for ReVanced to YouTube Music.

name: optimize-resource
description: Removes duplicate resources and adds missing translation files from YouTube.

name: optimize-resource-music
description: Remove unnecessary resources.

name: overlay-buttons
description: Add overlay buttons for ReVanced Extended.

name: patch-options
description: Create an options.toml file.

options.title: Application Name of YouTube
options.description: The name of the YouTube it will show on your home screen.

options.title: Package Name of YouTube
options.description: The package name of the YouTube. (NON-ROOT user only)

options.title: Package Name of YouTube Music
options.description: The package name of the YouTube Music. (NON-ROOT user only)

options.title: Custom Speed Values
options.description: A list of custom video speeds. Be sure to separate them with commas (,).

options.title: Background color for the dark theme
options.description: The background color of the dark theme. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

name: remove-player-button-background
description: Removes the background from the video player buttons.

name: return-youtube-dislike
description: Shows the dislike count of videos using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

name: settings
description: Applies mandatory patches to implement ReVanced settings into the application.

name: sponsorblock
description: Integrates SponsorBlock which allows skipping video segments such as sponsored content.

name: swipe-controls
description: Adds volume and brightness swipe controls.

name: theme
description: Applies a custom theme (default: amoled).

name: translations
description: Add Crowdin Translations.

name: translations-music
description: Add Crowdin Translations for YouTube Music
